## Overview

- Strategic timing of disclosures
- Risk premia and announcement returns

## Voluntary disclosures

- If known to be informed, equilibrium is to disclose (Grossman/Milgrom)
- If some possibility of being uninformed, equilibrium is threshold strategy: good types disclose and bad types do not (Dye, 1985)
- Risk premia (Dye-Hughes, 2018)
  - stati
- American option (Acharya-DeMarzo-Kremer, 2011): 
  - signal correlated with later public signal
  - provides incentive to keep disclosure option alive
